about me

let me tell you a bit about me

bio

I have been working as a developer for 10 years and have been actively involved in web development and programming for 15 specialising in Front End but increasing my skill set to becoming Full Stack. I have worked on and am proficient with HTML, CSS/SASS, Vanilla Javascript, PHP and MySQL. In addition to these I am in the process of learning Node.js, React and Flutter & Dart. Programming and development started off as a hobby, increased to a passion and became a lifestyle.
